circularOrbit

接口 CircularOrbit<L,E>

  • 类型参数:
    L - class of central object in circular orbit which is one of Star, Person and Nucleus.
    E - class of physical object in circular orbit which is mostly PhysicalObject.
    所有超级接口:
    java.lang.Iterable<E>
    所有已知实现类:
    AtomStructure, ConcreteCircularOrbit, SocialNetworkCircle, StellarSystem

    public interface CircularOrbit<L,E>
extends java.lang.Iterable<E>
    作者:
    Shen

    • 方法详细资料

      • addTrack

        void addTrack(Track track)
        Mutator. Add a track into circular orbit.
        参数:
        track - an added track

      • deleteTrack

        void deleteTrack(Track track)
        Mutator. Delete a track from circular orbit.
        参数:
        track - the deleted track

      • addCentralObject

        void addCentralObject(L centralObject)
        Mutator. Add a central object into circular orbit. This method should only perform in circular orbit with central object.
        参数:
        centralObject - a central object

      • addPhysicalObjectToTrack

        void addPhysicalObjectToTrack(E physicalObject,
                              Track track)
        Mutator. Add a physical object into a track.
        参数:
        physicalObject - the added physical object
        track - the target track

      • addRelationshipBetweenCentralAndPhysical

        void addRelationshipBetweenCentralAndPhysical(E physicalObject,
                                              boolean fromCentral,
                                              double weight)
        Mutator. Add a relationship with a intimacy of weight from the central object to a physical object or the other way round. This method should only perform in circular orbit with relationship which is mostly social network circle.
        参数:
        physicalObject - the physical object in this relationship
        fromCentral - true if the relationship is from central object to physical object, false if the relationship is from physical object to central object
        weight - the intimacy of this relationship, it should be a decimal from zero to one.

      • addRelationshipBetweenPhysicalAndPhysical

        void addRelationshipBetweenPhysicalAndPhysical(E physicalObjectA,
                                               E physicalObjectB,
                                               double weight)
        Mutator. Add a relationship between physicalObject A and physicalObject B with a intimacy of weight. This method should only perform in circular orbit with relationship.
        参数:
        physicalObjectA - the source physical object of this relationship
        physicalObjectB - the target physical object of this relationship
        weight - the intimacy of this relationship, it should be a decimal from zero to one

      • readFromFile

        void readFromFile(java.io.File file)
           throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                  java.lang.NumberFormatException,
                  java.io.IOException,
                  AtomElementException,
                  AtomTrackNumException,
                  AtomElectronNumException,
                  DataSyntaxException,
                  DataScientificNumberException,
                  IllegalIntimacyInSocialTieException
        Read data from file. All certain circular orbits are different so this method will be override in each particular class. But no matter what kind of circular orbit, before it's read from file, it's representations must be reset.
        参数:
        file - the data file
        抛出:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - file not found exception
        AtomElectronNumException - This exception is about electron number in atom structure. This includes that data doesn't indicate electron number for some tracks, number of track doesn't match the number of electron. information.
        AtomTrackNumException - This exception is about track number in atom structure. The number of track is not positive integer in data file.
        AtomElementException - This exception is about nucleus element in atom structure. This includes that element of atom contains 0 or more than 2 characters, the first character is not a upper case character, or the second character is not a lower case character.
        java.io.IOException - This exception may happen when read file with BufferedReader.
        java.lang.NumberFormatException - This exception may happen like when parameter in Integer.parseOf() doesn't match format.
        DataSyntaxException - This exception is about data in file may doesn't fit syntax in specification. When this exception happens, it means some components in format data fail to match regular expression.
        DataScientificNumberException - This exception is about illegal scientifc number notation. This includes that the mantissa is not between 1 and 10 or the exponent is less than 4.
        IllegalIntimacyInSocialTieException - This exception may happens only in social network circle. When this exception happens, it means the intimacy of a social tie is no more than 0 or greater than 1.

      • constructSocialNetworkCircle

        void constructSocialNetworkCircle(java.util.List<PhysicalObject> friends,
                                  java.util.List<Edge<PhysicalObject>> physicalEdges,
                                  java.util.Map<PhysicalObject,java.lang.Double>[] centralEdges)
        Construct social network circle according to list of physical objects, list of adjacency edges, from-center adjacency map from physical object to intimacy and to-center adjacency map from physical object to intimacy. This method should only be called when reading from file or reconstructing.

      • deleteRelationshipBetweenPhysicalAndPhysical

        void deleteRelationshipBetweenPhysicalAndPhysical(E physicalObjectA,
                                                  E physicalObjectB)
        Mutator. Delete a relationship between physicalObject A and physicalObject B.
        参数:
        physicalObjectA - the source physical object of the deleted relationship
        physicalObjectB - the target physical object of the deleted relationship

      • deletePhysicalObjectFromTrack

        void deletePhysicalObjectFromTrack(E physicalObject,
                                   Track track)
                            throws NoObjectOnTrackException
        Mutator. Delete a physical object from the certain track.
        参数:
        physicalObject - the deleted physical object
        track - the track in which the deleted physical object is
        抛出:
        NoObjectOnTrackException - This exception happens when the

      • resetObjectsAndTrack

        void resetObjectsAndTrack()
        Mutator. Delete all physical objects in tracks. This method should only perform when the circular orbit is restructured.

      • getCentralObject

        L getCentralObject()
        Observer. Get central object in circular orbit. This method should only perform in circular orbit with central object.
        返回:
        central object in this circular orbit

      • getTracks

        java.util.List<Track> getTracks()
        Observer. Get a defensive copy of the list of tracks in this circular orbit.
        返回:
        a defensive copy of the list of tracks in this circular orbit

      • getObjectsInTrack

        java.util.Map<Track,java.util.List<E>> getObjectsInTrack()
        Observer. Get a defensive copy of the map from tracks to lists of physical objects in circular orbit. This method should only perform in circular orbit with relationship.
        返回:
        a defensive copy of the map from tracks to lists of physical objects in circular orbit

      • getRelationBetweenCentralAndObject

        java.util.Map<E,java.lang.Double>[] getRelationBetweenCentralAndObject()
        Observer. Get a defensive copy of two maps from physical objects to intimacy in circular orbit. This method should only perform in circular orbit with relationship.
        返回:
        a defensive copy of two maps from physical objects to intimacy in circular orbit

      • getRelationBetweenObjects

        java.util.List<Edge<E>> getRelationBetweenObjects()
        Observer. Get a defensive copy of the list of edges representing adjacency relationships. This method should only perform in circular orbit with relationship.
        返回:
        a defensive copy of the list of edges representing adjacency relationships

      • save

        Memento<L,E> save()
        Save the current state into a Memento and return this Memento. This method should only perform in atom structure.
        返回:
        a Memento storing the current state

      • restore

        void restore(Memento<L,E> m)
        Restore a historical state from a Memento. This method should only perform in atom structure.
        参数:
        m - a Memento storing a historical state
